attributes.action: Consider the amount of money we spend on refugees, rather than poverty in our own country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All our taxes seem to go to people who are from other countries rather than those who are struggling to survive in our own country. This includes the un employed who get benefits, when some of us work hard and still struggle and go without.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Consider the amount of money we spend on refugees, rather than poverty in our own country."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11424.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/survival/
